name: Lip
text: I can't believe what I see!

name: Lip
text: You did it!

name: You
text: You call that a SMALL ISSUE?!

name: You
text: I nearly died!

name: Lip
text: But you didn't...

name: Lip
text: The chosen one, sent by the gods, praised by the lords.

name: You
text: What were those small, ugly, dark, crawling creatures?

name: You
text: They jumped all over me

name: Lip
text: I'll tell you everything, now that you have proven yourself.

name: Lip
text: I call them inklings.

name: Lip
text: those you just defeated were just a small part of the problem.

name: Lip
text: There are a lot more spread around the world...

name: You
text: There are more?!

name: Lip
text: Unfortunately this was just the beginning.

name: Lip
text: They want to destroy all of the art on earth...

name: Lip
text: By smearing it in their dark ink!

name: You
text: Oh no....

name: You
text: That's horrible!

name: You
text: We must stop them. What should I do?

name: Lip
text: They have probably invaded the museum by now.

name: Lip
text: Follow the river westward and cross the bridge.

name: Lip
text: The path will bring you to the main entrance.

name: You
text: Then I shall hurry!

name: Lip
text: Wait!...

name: Lip
text: Before you go...

name: You
text: Another gift?

name: Lip
text: Its a cloak, use L1 to sneak past enemies.

name: Lip
text: But watch out, it only works a few seconds at a time.

name: Lip
text: And it will slow you down a bit.

name: Lip
text: Now go and save the art from the inkmonsters!!
